column1: Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) - Medical Exams
column2:
**Pre-Offer:** Banned.
**Post-Offer:** Allowed if job-related and consistent w/ business necessity.
Prohibits using genetic info (incl. family medical history) for employment decisions or health underwriting.
Must file charge with EEOC first (Administrative Exhaustion). Employer notified within **10 days**. Can only sue after 'Right to Sue' letter.
Prohibits lie detector tests for private employers (with narrow exceptions for security firms/drug manufacturers).
Employers must get written authorization to use consumer reports. Adverse Action requires providing a copy of the report.
